markdown:
# Challenge

Below are some additional words and/or swaps that could be used in this conversation. Take a look and try these out!

Instead of `cupán tae`:
> caife  
> KAH-feh  
> coffee  
> seaclaid the  
> SHAK-lawd heh  
> hot chocolate  
> bainín  
> BAN-een  
> flat white  

Instead of `trí`:

> dhá  
> ghaw  
> two  
> ceithre  
> KEH-hruh  
> four  
> cúig  
> koo-ig  
> five  
> sé  
> shay  
> six  
> seacht  
> shokht  
> seven  
> ocht  
> okht  
> eight  
> naoi  
> nee  
> nine  
> deich  
> jeh  
> ten
